title: Moltensteelman Pyrosaurus
description: A family of fantasy dragons individually crafted in gleaming stainless steel, each with its own style and personality. Some are animated, some breathe fire, and all are exquisite.  Articulated wings spread majestically or fold flat to the body. Delightful on the patio or in the home, the Pyrosaurus makes a memorable accent for weddings, fantasy themed parties and special events. Your choice of jewel tones for the mounting ball on stand.

features.title: A range of options
features.description: All Pyrosaurus are made of rust-free stainless steel and have wings that fully extend and fold flat to the body. Adult Pyrosuarus is available with or without fire; also available with optional animation. Juvenile Pyrosaurus is available with or without fire. The Juvenile Delinquent (shown) breathes a 24 inch flame plume. Colossal Pyrosaurus is equipped with fire and is available as a stationary figure or with optional animation.

features.title: Fully designed and elegantly crafted
features.description: The Pyrosaurus are drawn from the artistâ€™s imagination and laser cut from original designs. Each Pyrosaurus is precision crafted and expertly welded, using heavy gauge stainless steel and top quality fittings for lasting quality.

features.title: Limited Artist's Production
features.description: The Pyrosaurus will be exclusively produced by the original artist in numbered limited edition.

features.title: Individually crafted
features.description: Individually crafted in gleaming stainless steel, each with its own style and personality. Some are animated, some breathe fire, and all are exquisite. Articulated wings spread majestically or fold flat to the body. Delightful on the patio or in the home, the Pyrosaurus makes a memorable accent for weddings, fantasy themed parties and special events. Your choice of jewel tones for the mounting ball on stand.

features.title: Different sizes
features.description: Adult Pyrosaurus Length: 32 inches Wingspan: 47 inches Juvenile Pyrosaurus Length: 18 inches Wingspan: 22 inches Colossal Pyrosaurus Length: 64 inches Wingspan: 94 inches

features.title: Fire Options
features.description: All sizes of Pyrosaurus are available with optional gas flame (for outdoor use only.) Adult and Colossal Pyrosaurus are available with optional computer controlled animation.
